dict.string: Kiné Helper needs access to your camera for scanning documents or video-based input.
Kiné Helper needs Bluetooth access to communicate with supported printers and smartcard readers.
Kiné Helper uses USB to access scanners, eID card readers and printer.
Kiné Helper saves PDFs and other exported documents to your Documents folder.
Kiné Helper can import patient images from your photo library if needed.
Kiné Helper needs internet access to synchronize data securely with cloud services.
